reference.title: SendAckMsg: To send a acknowlegde message

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: UINT SendAckMsg ( UINT PGN, BYTE AckType, BYTE DestAdres, UINT Channel)

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will be used to send a acknowledgement message based on the request.

section.title: Inputs
section.lines: PGN - PGN to requested. AckType - 0 for positive, 1 for negative acknowledgement. DestAdres - Destination node. Channel - Channel number.
